name: shapefile
description: An implementation of the shapefile (.shp) spatial data format.

scripts.prepublish: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp index.node.js dist/shapefile.node.js && rollup -g path-source,array-source,stream-source,slice-source -f cjs -- index.js | tail -n +2 >> dist/shapefile.node.js && rollup -c --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n shapefile -o dist/shapefile.js -- index.js && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" -o dist/shapefile.min.js -cm -- dist/shapefile.js
